overview: A fishing boat goes out to sea and catches a big fish in its net.  Because the big fish is not a fish but a mermaid  After that, Hang Chi, who was driving the truck carrying the mermaid, had to face the strange creature mermaid in order to save her son who was trapped in the research room.  Let's take a look at how she overcomes the difficulties of life and death.
title: Murloc
